EmailTemplate.name: IFAP - July reminders
EmailTemplate.subject: Financial Review 2012 Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
IATA Numeric code: {!Case.IFAP_Agent_Code__c}
Dear {!Account.Name},
This is a reminder following our request for your company’s financial documents.
We would like to advise you that we have undergone a technical migration and your financial statements must now be uploaded only through the new IATA Financial Assessment Portal, by using the following link:
http://www.iata.org/ifap
Your username to the IATA Financial Assessment Portal is the e-mail address to which you have received this message.
As you will be registering on the IATA Financial Assessment Portal for the first time, please go to “Not registered yet?” and enter this email address to register.
Please refer to the FAQ sheet for instructions on how to upload your financial statements and other frequently asked questions.
Should you experience any difficulties or have any other queries relating to this matter, including your email and contact details, please contact us via our Customer Service Portal http://www.iata.org/cs and refer to your case number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Thank you for your cooperation.
Sincerely,
IATA Accreditation
